<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.JSValidator</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Helps it the validation of java script code.</description> <name>JSValidator</name> <script><![CDATA[var JSValidator = Class.create();
JSValidator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { validate: function() { return GlideSystemUtilScript._getScriptError(this.getParameter('sysparm_js_expression'), this.getParameter('sysparm_scope')); } });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>juell.solaegui</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2010-01-18 19:31:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>42e7a4c50a0a0b1e0037b1b0ec4d552a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>JSValidator</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_42e7a4c50a0a0b1e0037b1b0ec4d552a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-30 20:25:06</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>275</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
